column1: #SHEETINFO | name=Length and mass units

column3:
Relationships between length units:
1 cm = 10 mm
1 dm = 10 cm = 100 mm
1 m = 10 dm = 100 cm = 1000 mm
1 km = 1 000 m = 10 000 dm = 100 000 cm = 1 000 000 mm

Relationships between mass units:
* 1 dag = 10 g
* 1 kg = 100 dag = 1 000 g
* 1 t = 1 000 kg = 100 000 dag = 1 000 000 g

If you multiply by 10, 100, 1000, etc., append the corresponding number of zeros to the number being multiplied. 200 √ó 10 = 2 000 3 000 √ó 100 = 300 000 ---- If you divide a number ending in zeros by 100, 1000, etc., remove as many zeros from the dividend as there are in the divisor. 42 000 √∑ 100 = 420

If the length is expressed in different units, convert the larger one to the smaller one and/or the smaller to the larger, then add them together, e.g.
* 1 cm 2 mm = 10 mm + 2 mm = 12 mm
* 4 m 200 mm = 40 dm + 2 dm = 42 dm

column1: Length units

Converting length units:

1 km = üéàm
1 m = üéÅ cm
1 dm = üí£ cm
1 cm = üíù mm
column2:
1 km = 1000 m
1 m = 100 cm
1 dm = 10 cm
1 cm = 10 mm
